description: <p>The Pharmacy Department is a forward thinking and a progressive department seeking to expand our current team as we develop a patient focused, modern hospital pharmacy service to the Trust. We have an active technician training programme and a proven track record in staff development.<br /><br />We are looking to recruit a self- motivated and enthusiastic technician who has great initiative and flair. The successful applicant will need to be committed to self- development, have strong attention to detail with excellent dispensary and organisational skills who is able to work to tight timescales. Your support is vital to the continuing expansions of our patient focused pharmacy services.<br /><br />The work is varied and will include:<br /><br />• Dispensing for inpatients, outpatients and our peripheral units<br />• Medicines Management on the wards if eligible<br />• Counselling patients on their medication<br /><br />You will need:<br />• To be a registered Pharmacy Technician with the General Pharmaceutical Council.</p>
title: Registered Pharmacy Technician Rotational
